title: mirek92
author: mirek92
content: Hello,Do you know how to add chart of smart contract from Pancakeswap to Dextools and Poocoin? Or is it done automatically?Thank you for reply

comments.author: cryptoaddictchie
comments.body: Quote from: mirek92 on May 31, 2022, 01:56:42 PMHello,Do you know how to add chart of smart contract from Pancakeswap to Dextools and Poocoin? Or is it done automatically?Thank you for replyJust input the smart contract of tokens on dextool and poocoin. Or even so name of the tokens you wanted to see the chart.Its automatically there if the project is popular or famous since they display top 10 high volumes on those platform. But if its not, then you need to manually add the smart contract which should be recommended to avoid such copy paste project.Many are imitating a project using a different contract and some got victim by it if not check carefully if they looking on the right token chart.

comments.author: WalkerIVIV
comments.body: Quote from: mirek92 on May 31, 2022, 01:56:42 PMHello,Do you know how to add chart of smart contract from Pancakeswap to Dextools and Poocoin? It's not a difficult task. The thing that you shall do to copy the smartcontract of token from the pancakeswap or BSC scan and then put it on the search toolbar on the dextools or poocoin. The system will be automatically searching the pair in the blockchain. You can choose which pair from the list. Quote from: mirek92 on May 31, 2022, 01:56:42 PMOr is it done automatically?Thank you for replyIt's done automatically

comments.author: crytolad
comments.body: Quote from: WalkerIVIV on June 16, 2022, 11:44:37 AMQuote from: mirek92 on May 31, 2022, 01:56:42 PMHello,Do you know how to add chart of smart contract from Pancakeswap to Dextools and Poocoin? It's not a difficult task. The thing that you shall do to copy the smartcontract of token from the pancakeswap or BSC scan and then put it on the search toolbar on the dextools or poocoin. The system will be automatically searching the pair in the blockchain. You can choose which pair from the list. Quote from: mirek92 on May 31, 2022, 01:56:42 PMOr is it done automatically?Thank you for replyIt's done automaticallyI've been wanting to know how to do this before now, until I stumbled on this post. Thanks a lot for the information.
